bibl.title: Teachers in the Eastern Roman Empire (Fifth-Seventh Centuries). A Historical Study and Prosopography.

series.title: The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VIII

bibl.title: Alexandria. Auditoria of Kom el-Dikka and Late Antique Education

bibl.note: Introduction. - First stages of education. - Teacher of grammar - grammatikÒw. - Teacher of rhetoric - sofistÆw and =Ætvr. - Teacher of philosophy - filÒsofow. - Teacher of medicine - ﬁatrosofistÆw. - Teacher of law - éntekÆnsvr. - Prosopography of teachers [1-320]. - Geographical and chronological list of teachers. - Pp. 330-333: Egypt. <grammatikos, sophistes, rhetor, philosophos, iatrosophistes, antekensor>
